ModMetaData.name: Pirated Hair From Another Mods
ModMetaData.author: REÐ‘AL
ModMetaData.description: Too much of the stuff already, in every pack theres only a few interesting pieces, so why having to overhaul game too much? Carefully selected only the most interesting stuff put together by me, and all the unnecessary stuff deleted/disabled in Defs. Packs that got my attention: Odz ... ... [singing in red haired french language]: *uck them all! atutu atutu atutu...
